description: Sample number/name used by the lab which performed the analyses or managed the samples for analysis.
Any other form of reference used in the sample documentation.
Sample number used on-site during archaeological excavation, and relating to excavation documentation.
Sampling number used during field survey.
Sample number/name used by a museum. Include prefix if present.
Sample number/name used by contractor, as submitted to lab or extracted from site documentation. Include prefix if present.
Number/name of the insect/sediment etc trap.
Local identification used by a museum.
Identification used in the field for artifacts
SEAD identification made by concatenating two, or more, existing identifications
Unique identifier for (physical) samples in the BugsCEP database
Sequence library ID code (generated by ADU). Identifies one of multiple possible libraries generated for a DNA sample.
DNA library ID associated with a sample
